alert.note: Alert for Ozark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:18PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ozark County through 500 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gainesville, or 12 miles north of Mountain Home, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norfork Lake, Gainesville, Bakersfield, Hardenville, Udall and Tecumseh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Missouri.
